faqs.name: Who is SimbiBot?
faqs.content: Hello, My name is Simbi. I am a platform (chat-bot) that will help you learn and master any topic so that you can excel in your exams and achieve your dreams.   I will also help you evaluate yourself to be sure you really know the topic you have learnt.

faqs.name: Can I use Simbibot on my phone?
faqs.content: Of course! I am available on all platforms including phones, laptops and tablets. I will soon be available on USSD too.

faqs.name: What age and classes do you work with?
faqs.content: I can currently teach teenagers at secondary school level.

faqs.name: Why is Simbibot better than  a private tutor ?
faqs.content: With me, you can learn and re-learn a concept as many times as you wish without having a remorse feeling of stressing a tutor. Don't also forget I am available anywhere anytime.

faqs.name: How many times can I learn a topic with Simbibot ?
faqs.content: There are no restrictions on the number of times you can learn a topic. You can keep learning for as long as you need to understand.

faqs.name: Can my learning process be monitored by my Parents and Teachers
faqs.content: Yes absolutely, your learning curve and progress reports are shared with your parents and teacher.

faqs.name: Why should I join the Simbibot community
faqs.content: Join the community to get a lot of benefits which includes discount offers, access to valuable information, group learning etc.
